summary: An Asian looking character I have used in my game using familiar faces.
descriptionHtml:
Since we are talking about fighters I tried to make her look like Luci Liu  (  a favorite action movie actor ). I hope I got it right  ;-)    I used some instructions from " Asian race in Skyrim " by Erundil .

how to install:
-----------------
Unpack the file and copy the 3 folders under data to your game's data folder. Go to your shrine of heroes and activate her. Pls pay attention to required files and follow instructions included in them.

Required files:
-------------------
Familiar Faces
Apachii Hair
Racemenu
author: Northlandersky
